results.title: C-Hill changes overnight. Congratulations Class of 2024 | Carson City ...
results.description: As the tradition goes, the senior class at Carson High School changes C-Hill annually to reflect the year's graduating class. Congratulations Class of 2024. Carson High's graduation is Saturday, 9 ...

results.title: Nevada GOP lists locations for Feb. 8 caucus | Serving Carson City for ...
results.description: The caucus is run by the Nevada Republican Party and will include five candidates: Ryan Binkley, Chris Christie, Ron DeSantis, Vivek Ramaswamy and Donald J. Trump. In the Carson region, the following locations will host the caucus: • Carson City. Casino Fandango, 3800 S. Carson St., for precincts 103, 105, 107, 109, 303, 305, 401, 403, 405 ...

results.title: Recorders Office | Carson City
results.description: Recorder's Office. 885 East Musser Street, Suite 1028. Carson City, NV 89701. Map. (775) 887-2260. For same day recording please present the documents prior to 4:30 p.m. Monday - Friday.

results.title: Candidate Information | Nevada Secretary of State
results.description: If you have any questions regarding this information, or if you experience any difficulty in opening a candidate bank account, please contact the Secretary of State's Elections Division at (775) 684-5705 or nvelect@sos.nv.gov. CAMPAIGN FINANCE REPORTING REQUIREMENTS. CANDIDATE RESOURCES. Guides & Publications.
